00035   struct AppPolicy : Config::Policy {
00036     static void init_options() {
00037       cmdline_desc().add_options()
00038         ("no-log-sync", boo()->default_value(false),
00039          "Don't sync rangeserver commit logs on autoflush")

00050 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00051 
00052   CommandShellPtr shell;
00053   CommandInterpreterPtr interp;
00054   Client *hypertable;
00055   int status = 0;
00056 
00057   try {
00058     init_with_policies<Policies>(argc, argv);
00059 
00060     hypertable = new Hypertable::Client();
00061     interp = new HqlCommandInterpreter(hypertable);
00062     shell = new CommandShell("hypertable", interp, properties);
00063     interp->set_silent(shell->silent());
00064     interp->set_test_mode(shell->test_mode());
00065 
00066     status = shell->run();
00067   }
00068   catch(Exception &e) {
00069     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00070     status = e.code();
00071   }
00072   _exit(status);
00073 }
